posts.content: Heavy rains reported in Dadar area. Waterlogging starting to affect traffic. Please drive carefully. #MumbaiRains
posts.author: CitizenReporter

posts.content: RT @CitizenReporter: Heavy rains in Dadar. Waterlogging affecting traffic. Avoid the area if possible. #MumbaiRains
posts.author: MumbaiTrafficUpdate

posts.content: Dadar is completely underwater! Cars are floating away! It's a disaster zone! #MumbaiFlood
posts.author: PanicMonger

posts.content: BREAKING: Dam broken near Dadar! 10ft waves crashing into buildings! Govt hiding the truth! RUN! #MumbaiDoomed
posts.author: ConspiracyKing

posts.content: Just passed Dadar. It's raining hard but no dam burst. Stop spreading fake news! #MumbaiRains
posts.author: FactChecker_Ind

posts.content: My uncle works at the municipality, he says they are opening the floodgates! South Mumbai will sink in 1 hour! Forward this!
posts.author: WhatsAppUncle

posts.content: Water levels receding in Dadar. BMC pumps are working. Situation under control.
posts.author: BMC_Official

posts.content: Got my COVID booster today. Feeling fine, just a sore arm. Stay safe everyone! #VaccineSavesLives
posts.author: HealthWorker_Mumbai

posts.content: My friend got the booster and had fever for 2 days. Common side effect but manageable. #Vaccine
posts.author: ConcernedCitizen

posts.content: WARNING: The booster is causing severe reactions! My neighbor was hospitalized! They're not telling us the truth! #VaccineInjury
posts.author: AntiVaxWarrior

posts.content: BREAKING: Vaccine contains microchips! 5G activation confirmed! Government tracking everyone! Wake up sheeple! #VaccineTruth
posts.author: ConspiracyHub

posts.content: Doctor here. Vaccine side effects are well-documented and temporary. No microchips, no 5G. Please trust science. #FactCheck
posts.author: Dr_Sharma_MD

posts.content: My cousin's friend died 3 days after vaccine! They're covering it up! Don't take it! #VaccineDeaths
posts.author: FearMonger2025

posts.content: Official data: 2.5 billion doses administered. Serious adverse events: 0.002%. Vaccine is safe and effective. #COVID19
posts.author: WHO_India

posts.content: Long queues at polling stations in Bangalore. Democracy in action! #KarnatakaElections
posts.author: VoterBLR

posts.content: Some EVMs showing errors in Whitefield area. Election officials fixing them. #Elections2025
posts.author: PollObserver

posts.content: EVMs are rigged! Votes being changed! I saw it with my own eyes! This is election fraud! #StopTheSteal
posts.author: AngryVoter

posts.content: MASSIVE FRAUD: Truckloads of fake ballots arriving at counting centers! Opposition being cheated! Revolution now! #ElectionFraud
posts.author: PoliticalTroll

posts.content: Election Commission statement: All EVMs functioning normally. No evidence of tampering. Observers present at all locations. #FreeAndFair
posts.author: ElectionCommission

posts.content: Video proof of ballot stuffing! Share before they delete it! #ExposeFraud
posts.author: FakeNewsFactory

posts.content: Bought vegetables from local market. Always wash before cooking! #HealthyEating
posts.author: HomeCook_Delhi

posts.content: Friend got food poisoning from street vendor in Connaught Place. Be careful where you eat. #FoodSafety
posts.author: DelhiFoodie

posts.content: ALERT: Vegetables contaminated with pesticides! Multiple people hospitalized! Avoid all markets! #FoodCrisis
posts.author: PanicSpreader

posts.content: BREAKING: Terrorist attack on food supply! Poison in water! Don't eat or drink anything! Government silent! #FoodTerror
posts.author: FearMongerer

posts.content: FSSAI inspection: All major markets cleared. One vendor fined for hygiene violation. No contamination found. #FoodSafety
posts.author: FSSAI_Official
